org.omnaest.utils.table
Interface TableSelect<E>

Type Parameters:
E -
All Known Subinterfaces:
TableSelect.TableJoin<E>
All Known Implementing Classes:
TableSelectImpl
public interface TableSelect<E>

The TableSelect allows to select sub areas of a Table or join with other Table instances

Author:
Omnaest

Nested Class Summary
static interface TableSelect.Predicate<E>
           
static interface TableSelect.TableJoin<E>
           
static interface TableSelect.TableSelectExecution<E>
           
 
Method Summary
 TableSelect<E> allColumns()
          Selects all Columns of the last specified Table
 TableSelect<E> allColumns(ImmutableTable<E> table)
          Selects all Columns of the given ImmutableTable
 TableSelect.TableSelectExecution<E> as()
          Returns a TableSelect.TableSelectExecution instance which will calculate the result
 TableSelect<E> column(ImmutableColumn<E> column)
          Selects one ore more Columns related to the last specified Table
 TableSelect<E> column(ImmutableTable<E> table, int columnIndex)
          Selects one Columns by its index related to the given Table
 TableSelect<E> column(int columnIndex)
          Selects one Columns by its index related to the last specified Table
 TableSelect<E> columns(int columnIndex, int... columnIndices)
          Selects one ore more Columns by its index related to the last specified Table

 TableSelect<E> skip(int skip)
          The join will skip the given number of result rows before writing to the result.
 TableSelect<E> top(int top)
          The join will return only the given number of top rows as result.
 TableSelect<E> where(TableSelect.Predicate<E> predicate)
          Allows to add one TableSelect.Predicates which will filter the result of the cross product of TableSelect.Predicate.FilterRows
 TableSelect<E> where(TableSelect.Predicate<E> predicate, TableSelect.Predicate<E>... predicates)
          Allows to add one or more TableSelect.Predicates which will filter the result of the cross product of TableSelect.Predicate.FilterRows
 TableSelect<E> whereEqual(ImmutableColumn<E> column, E value)
          Filters all values which are Object.equals(Object) to the given value
 TableSelect<E> whereLike(ImmutableColumn<E> column, Pattern pattern)
          Filters all values which can be cast to String and which will match the given Pattern
 TableSelect<E> whereWithin(ImmutableColumn<E> column, Set<E> valueSet)
          Filters all values which are true if given to Set.contains(Object) of the given value Set
 TableSelect<E> withTableLock(boolean lockEnabled)
          If set to true, the select will set the ReentrantReadWriteLock.ReadLock on the last declared ImmutableTable
This means for a join only the last ImmutableTable will be locked during the select.

TableSelect.TableSelectExecution<E> as()

withTableLock

TableSelect<E> withTableLock(boolean lockEnabled)
If set to true, the select will set the ReentrantReadWriteLock.ReadLock on the last declared ImmutableTable
This means for a join only the last ImmutableTable will be locked during the select.

Parameters:
lockEnabled -
Returns:
this

skip

TableSelect<E> skip(int skip)
The join will skip the given number of result rows before writing to the result. This is counted post filtered.

Parameters:
skip -
Returns:
this
See Also:
top(int)

top

TableSelect<E> top(int top)
The join will return only the given number of top rows as result.

If skip(int) is applied also, this counts from the start after the skipped rows of the result.

Parameters:
top -
Returns:
See Also:
skip(int)
